definition: Grouping category for AlarmClock, ElectronicClock, WatchClock...

positive_examples: The dashboard clock showed it was nearly midnight.
She glanced at the speedometer to check she wasn't exceeding the limit.
The mechanic watched the tachometer to monitor engine RPMs.
After the road trip, the odometer read 50,000 miles.
The pilot checked both the airspeed indicator and the flight timer.
His watch displayed the exact time while the car's speedometer showed 65 mph.
negative_examples: The thermometer showed the temperature was rising.
She used a ruler to measure the length of the table.
The pressure gauge indicated the tire needed more air.
He weighed himself on the bathroom scale.
The voltmeter displayed the electrical current reading.
The fuel gauge showed the tank was nearly empty.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Thermometer, Scale, PressureGauge, Ruler
